column5: This MSc Digital Business master’s degree will give you vital insights into the digital economy. You'll explore the latest business strategies and technology, informed by our academics' research.This course is well suited for students who would like to create their own digital business or advance their careers in tech companies.Platforms like Uber and Airbnb, along with new and emerging technology, have changed the way we do business.This master's programme will explore these new innovations and business strategies. You'll learn how to create a successful digital start-up, and help organisations adopt digital technology.You'll focus on operational and technical aspects of the digital economy and study topics like:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
